title: Missing Champions???
body: Hi, good day, my friend recently bought me Hecarim and arcade hecarim. so naturally i accepted the gifts. i was going to play with him today but he was nowhere to be found hes not even in my collection. so my question is _where in the world is hecarim._ and what can i do to get him back.  R.I.P       {{champion:120}}

replies.body: We'd like to look into this with you!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing guys will check this out individually and see what's going on.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
